description:
During our tenor working for well-reputed Marketing consultancy, IT, Telecom and retail companies in the UK, Singapore, Dubai and Vietnam, we as a Marketing Outsourcing Company realised that every organisation how big or small they are they possess great potential. Potential to be bigger and better.

We also realised to make a company better it’s not only the processes that need to improve but the knowledge and experience of selected individuals who work for the company. A dream we both possessed for a long time could now become a reality. Our dream of working with a handful of employees in an organisation to working with thousands to help organisations to improve their Processers and to take the organisation to the next level by strategic marketing & Consultancy. Based in Vietnam with a multicultural team from Europe and Vietnam we can provide cost-effective solutions to companies all around the globe.

portfolios.des:
A 2 year long term project for Branding and Marketing to assist Beetsoft expand their target market from Japan to other parts of the world specially to the UK, Europe, North America, Australia and some other selected destinations.

Project Value: USD 5,000 - 10,000 Per month

WANA had to address many problems with Marketing, Brand Building Strategies, Ads Campaign and we found each other as the other part in this Digital Era. 

Project Value: USD 5,000 - 10,000 Per month

The in-house team of Potato Media was lacking in manpower and low performance in the first quarter of 2020. They reached out to Magister team to find a solution.

Project Value: USD 5,000 - 10,000 Per month

Got 150% increase in online reaches of social media channels. Successful branding resulted in a higher global ranking for the organisation’s official social accounts. 

Project Value: USD 5,000 - 10,000 Per month

Magister team also integrated with The Gallery Exclusive in-house marketing team, provided levels of communication and strategy that allowed our clients to meet marketing objectives, which was beyond their expectations.

Project Value: USD 2, 500 - 5,000 Per month

As a new face in the IT Industry in Vietnam, BEET Innovators faced up to with many challenges when developing their Marketing Strategy due to the fierce competition within the local market. 

Project Value: USD 500 - 1,000 Per month

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ho Chi Minh City
description:
Leading.vn is a professional Digital Marketing Agency based in Ho Chi Minh City. We specialize in providing SEO, PPC, Social Media and Content Marketing services. Moreover, our SEO services guarantee that there is no risks involved, since if it is ineffective, you will not have to make payment.

LEADING is an experienced selection of various marketers dedicated to tackling:

Digital strategy
Web design
Web development
SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
Paid media
Copywriting

You can visit our "Customer Reviews" page to check out their satisfaction with our services and what sets Leading Digital apart from other agencies.

Our mission is to help you build your brand with results-driven digital marketing campaigns and personalized data.

Contact us and develop your brand today.

portfolios.des: Our WordPress Speed Optimization Services can help you solve slow site problems, fix Core Web Vitals issues, score higher in Google PageSpeed Insights, troubleshoot slow backend issues, optimize Woocommerce checkout speed & much more.

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Tân Thới Hiệp
description:
Aegona is an IT service company based in Ho Chi Minh city, VietNam. At Aegona we provide Software Development, Software Testing, Automation Testing and Software Maintenance services for North America, Japan, Singapore and VietNam.
OUR SPECIALITY
- Microsoft Technology: Asp.Net, Asp.net core, SharePoint, Microsoft Dynamic CRM,...
- Web Development: Html5/css3, JQuery, AngularJS, Angular2/4, Node.js, ReactJS, VueJS,...
- Mobile Development: Native Application (iOS, Android, Windows), Hybrid Application (ReactNative, Xamarin)...
- Cloud-Based Development: Azure Cloud, Amazone Cloud AWS, Google Cloud,...
- CMS, eCommerce and more: WordPress, Drupal, Laravel, UmbracoCMS, .Net OrchardCMS, Magento, nopCommerce, Blockchain, Ethrereum, Hyperledger...

description:

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Ho Chi Minh City
description:
Founded in 2013 in Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam with a small team of developers, fram^ team has been growing the current team of >130 employees across offices in Ho Chi Minh, Da Nang, Colombo and Stockholm.

Starting from the original ecommerce specialism, fram^'s services today have spanned to provides clients with end-to-end digital solutions including Tech Consulting, Digital Consulting, Custom Software Development, Web App Development, Mobile App Development, IT Managed Services, DevOps Services, etc.

We work in flexible models of engagement across all of the services to provide clients with the ability to scale or change at any time to their needs. Four of our working formats are: Managed Services, Dedicated Team, Build-Operate-Transfer, and Fixed & Flexible Projects.

Since 2017, fram^ has become a group company publicly listed on Nasdaq First North: FRAM B. fram^ is recently proud to be ranked #212 among Europe's 1,000 fastest growing companies by the prestigious Financial Times!

location: Vietnam, Hồ Chí Minh, Tân Phong
description:
WHO WE ARE?

In a world where 95% of companies fail, Dizitech will help your brand succeed and prosper! No matter what your goals are – building or strengthening your brand, generating leads, increasing awareness for your products or services, driving qualified traffic to your website or app, reaching your target audience, improving conversion rates, and more – we can help you achieve them all thanks to our expertise in digital marketing, growth hacking, lead generation, conversion rate optimization, and more.

HOW IS DIZITECH DIFFERENT?

Here at Dizitech, we take a “big picture” approach to growth – combining a wide range of digital marketing techniques and tactics along with data analytics and product/service improvement for maximum effectiveness. With all of these elements combined, Dizitech can help you achieve your goals efficiently and effectively.
